long_description: The small REI eCycle lunch container is the perfect size for a serving of yogurt, applesauce or fruit. eCycle plastic is made from 100% recycled food-grade polypropylene that is 25% post-consumer content; polypropylene plastic is 100% BPA free. Leakproof lid keeps your lunch from spilling on the way to work. Small container holds 4 fl. oz. Bottom is microwave safe; do not microwave the top. Top rack dishwasher safe. The REI eCycle small lunch container is recyclable where #5 plastic is collected.
short_description: The small REI eCycle lunch container is the perfect size for a serving of yogurt, applesauce or fruit.
